trans-unit.source: powershell, cmdlet
trans-unit.target: powershell 指令程式

trans-unit.source: Get-Host
trans-unit.target: Get-Host

trans-unit.source: Get-Host
trans-unit.target: Get-Host

trans-unit.source: SYNOPSIS
trans-unit.target: 概要

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that represents the current host program.
trans-unit.target: 取得代表目前主機程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: SYNTAX
trans-unit.target: 語法

trans-unit.source: DESCRIPTION
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: The **Get-Host** cmdlet gets an object that represents the program that is hosting Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: **Get-host** cmdlet 會取得代表裝載 Windows PowerShell 之程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: The default display includes the Windows PowerShell version number and the current region and language settings that the host is using, but the host object contains a wealth of information, including detailed information about the version of Windows PowerShell that is currently running and the current culture and UI culture of Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 預設顯示會包含 Windows PowerShell 版本號碼及主機使用的目前地區和語言設定，但是主機物件則包含很豐富的資訊，包括目前執行中之 Windows PowerShell 版本的相關詳細資訊，以及 Windows PowerShell 的目前文化特性和 UI 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: You can also use this cmdlet to customize features of the host program user interface, such as the text and background colors.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以使用這個指令程式，以自訂功能的主機程式使用者介面，例如文字和背景色彩。

trans-unit.source: EXAMPLES
trans-unit.target: 範例

trans-unit.source: Example 1: Get information about the PowerShell console host
trans-unit.target: 範例 1︰ 取得 PowerShell 主控台主機的相關資訊

trans-unit.source: This command displays information about the Windows PowerShell console, which is the current host program for Windows PowerShell in this example.
trans-unit.target: 此命令顯示 Windows PowerShell 主控台的相關資訊，此主控台是這個範例中 Windows PowerShell 的目前主機程式。

trans-unit.source: It includes the name of the host, the version of Windows PowerShell that is running in the host, and current culture and UI culture.
trans-unit.target: 它包含主機的名稱、主機中正在執行之 Windows PowerShell 的版本，以及目前文化特性和 UI 文化特性。

trans-unit.source: The Version, UI, CurrentCulture, CurrentUICulture, PrivateData, and Runspace properties each contain an object with very useful properties.
trans-unit.target: Version、UI、CurrentCulture、CurrentUICulture、PrivateData 及 Runspace 屬性每個都包含具有非常實用之屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: Later examples examine these properties.
trans-unit.target: 稍後的範例會探討這些屬性。

trans-unit.source: Example 2: Resize the PowerShell window
trans-unit.target: 範例 2︰ 重新調整大小的 PowerShell 視窗

trans-unit.source: This command resizes the Windows PowerShell window to 10 pixels by 10 pixels.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將 Windows PowerShell 視窗大小調整為 10x10 像素。

trans-unit.source: Example 3: Get the PowerShell version for the host
trans-unit.target: 範例 3︰ 取得主控件的 PowerShell 版本

trans-unit.source: This command gets detailed information about the version of Windows PowerShell running in the host.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得主機中執行之 Windows PowerShell 版本的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: You can view, but not change, these values.
trans-unit.target: 您可以檢視這些值，但無法變更。

trans-unit.source: The Version property of **Get-Host** contains a **System.Version** object.
trans-unit.target: Version 屬性 **Get-host** 包含 **System.Version** 物件。

trans-unit.source: This command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the version object to the Format-List cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用管線運算子 (|) 將版本物件傳送至 Format-List Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: The **Format-List** command uses the *Property* parameter with a value of all (*) to display all of the properties and property values of the version object.
trans-unit.target: **Format-list** 命令會使用 *屬性* 參數值是所有 （*） 顯示的所有屬性和屬性值的物件版本。

trans-unit.source: Example 4: Get the current culture for the host
trans-unit.target: 範例 4︰ 取得目前的文化特性的主應用程式

trans-unit.source: This command gets detailed information about the current culture set for Windows PowerShell running in the host.
trans-unit.target: 此命令取得主機中執行之 Windows PowerShell 的目前文化特性設定的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: This is the same information that is returned by the Get-Culture cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 這項資訊與 Get-Culture Cmdlet 傳回的資訊相同。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the **CurrentUICulture** property returns the same object that Get-UICulture returns.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地， **CurrentUICulture** 屬性就會傳回相同的物件，該 Get-uiculture 傳回。

trans-unit.source: The **CurrentCulture** property of the host object contains a **System.Globalization.CultureInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: **CurrentCulture** 主物件的屬性包含 **System.Globalization.CultureInfo** 物件。

trans-unit.source: This command uses a pipeline operator (|) to send the **CultureInfo** object to the Format-List cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 此命令使用管線運算子 (|) 將傳送 **CultureInfo** Format-list 指令程式的物件。

trans-unit.source: The **Format-List** command uses the *Property* parameter with a value of all (*) to display all of the properties and property values of the **CultureInfo** object.
trans-unit.target: **Format-list** 命令會使用 *屬性* 參數，且所有的值 (*) 若要顯示的所有屬性和屬性值 **CultureInfo** 物件。

trans-unit.source: Example 5: Get the DateTimeFormat for the current culture
trans-unit.target: 範例 5︰ 取得目前的文化特性 DateTimeFormat

trans-unit.source: This command returns detailed information about the DateTimeFormat of the current culture that is being used for Windows PowerShell.
trans-unit.target: 此命令傳回 Windows PowerShell 正在使用之目前文化特性 DateTimeFormat 的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The **CurrentCulture** property of the host object contains a **CultureInfo** object that, in turn, has many useful properties.
trans-unit.target: **CurrentCulture** 主物件的屬性包含 **CultureInfo** 物件，後者又具有許多有用的屬性。

trans-unit.source: Among them, the **DateTimeFormat** property contains a **DateTimeFormatInfo** object with many useful properties.
trans-unit.target: 其中之一， **DateTimeFormat** 屬性包含 **DateTimeFormatInfo** 具有許多實用屬性的物件。

trans-unit.source: To find the type of an object that is stored in an object property, use the Get-Member cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要尋找物件屬性中儲存之物件的類型，請使用 Get-Member Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: To display the property values of the object, use the Format-List cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 若要顯示物件的屬性值，請使用 Format-List Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: Example 6: Get the RawUI property for the host
trans-unit.target: 範例 6︰ 取得主應用程式之 RawUI 屬性

trans-unit.source: This command displays the properties of the **RawUI** property of the host object.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會顯示的屬性 **之 RawUI** 主物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: By changing these values, you can change the appearance of the host program.
trans-unit.target: 藉由變更這些值，您便可以變更主機程式的外觀。

trans-unit.source: Example 7: Set the background color for the PowerShell console
trans-unit.target: 範例 7︰ 設定 PowerShell 主控台的背景色彩

trans-unit.source: These commands change the background color of the Windows PowerShell console to black.
trans-unit.target: 這些命令將 Windows PowerShell 主控台的背景色彩變更為黑色。

trans-unit.source: The **cls** command is an alias for the Clear-Host function, which clears the screen and changes the whole screen to the new color.
trans-unit.target: **Cls** 命令是 Clear-host 函式，以清除畫面並將整個畫面變更成新的色彩的別名。

trans-unit.source: This change is effective only in the current session.
trans-unit.target: 這項變更只在目前的工作階段中有效。

trans-unit.source: To change the background color of the console for all sessions, add the command to your Windows PowerShell profile.
trans-unit.target: 若要變更所有工作階段的主控台背景色彩，請將命令新增到您的 Windows PowerShell 設定檔中。

trans-unit.source: Example 8: Set the background color for error messages
trans-unit.target: 範例 8︰ 設定錯誤訊息的背景色彩

trans-unit.source: This command changes the background color of error messages to white.
trans-unit.target: 此命令將錯誤訊息的背景色彩變更為白色。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the $Host automatic variable, which contains the host object for the current host program.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 $Host 自動變數，包含目前主機程式的主物件。

trans-unit.source: **Get-Host** returns the same object that $Host contains, so you can use them interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: **取得主機** 傳回相同的物件，包含 $Host，因此您可以交換使用。

trans-unit.source: This command uses the PrivateData property of $Host as its ErrorBackgroundColor property.
trans-unit.target: 此命令會使用 $Host 的 PrivateData 屬性做為其 ErrorBackgroundColor 屬性。

trans-unit.source: To see all of the properties of the object in the $Host.PrivateData property, type `$host.privatedata | format-list *`.
trans-unit.target: 若要查看所有 $Host.PrivateData 屬性中物件的屬性，請輸入 `$host.privatedata | format-list *`。

trans-unit.source: PARAMETERS
trans-unit.target: 參數

trans-unit.source: CommonParameters
trans-unit.target: CommonParameters

trans-unit.source: This cmdlet supports the common parameters: -Debug, -ErrorAction, -ErrorVariable, -InformationAction, -InformationVariable, -OutVariable, -OutBuffer, -PipelineVariable, -Verbose, -WarningAction, and -WarningVariable.
trans-unit.target: 這個 cmdlet 支援一般參數:-偵錯、-ErrorAction、-ErrorVariable、-InformationAction-InformationVariable、-OutVariable、-OutBuffer、-PipelineVariable、-Verbose、-WarningAction 以及-WarningVariable。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_CommonParameters (http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=113216)。

trans-unit.source: INPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸入

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 無

trans-unit.source: You cannot pipe input to this cmdlet.
trans-unit.target: 您無法使用管線傳送輸入至此 Cmdlet。

trans-unit.source: OUTPUTS
trans-unit.target: 輸出

trans-unit.source: System.Management.Automation.Internal.Host.InternalHost
trans-unit.target: System.Management.Automation.Internal.Host.InternalHost

trans-unit.source: **Get-Host** returns a **System.Management.Automation.Internal.Host.InternalHost** object.
trans-unit.target: **取得主機** 傳回 **System.Management.Automation.Internal.Host.InternalHost** 物件。

trans-unit.source: NOTES
trans-unit.target: 附註

trans-unit.source: The $Host automatic variable contains the same object that **Get-Host** returns, and you can use it in the same way.
trans-unit.target: $Host 自動變數包含相同的物件， **Get-host** 傳回，而且您可以使用它在相同的方式。

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the $PSCulture and $PSUICulture automatic variables contain the same objects that the **CurrentCulture** and **CurrentUICulture** properties of the host object contain.
trans-unit.target: 同樣地，$PSCulture 和 $PSUICulture 自動變數包含相同的物件， **CurrentCulture** 和 **CurrentUICulture** 包含主應用程式物件的屬性。

trans-unit.source: You can use these features interchangeably.
trans-unit.target: 您可以將這些功能交換使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see about_Automatic_Variables.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 about_Automatic_Variables。

trans-unit.source: RELATED LINKS
trans-unit.target: 相關的連結

trans-unit.source: Clear-Host
trans-unit.target: Clear-Host

trans-unit.source: Out-Host
trans-unit.target: Out-Host

trans-unit.source: Read-Host
trans-unit.target: Read-Host

trans-unit.source: Write-Host
trans-unit.target: Write-Host
